content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'airportdemofilesystem_airportdemoadls_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [airportdemofilesystem_airportdemoadls_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://airportdemofilesystem@airportdemoadls.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE LargeAirports (
	[ident] nvarchar(4000),
	[name] nvarchar(4000),
	[elevation_ft] nvarchar(4000),
	[continent] nvarchar(4000),
	[iso_country] nvarchar(4000),
	[iso_region] nvarchar(4000),
	[municipality] nvarchar(4000),
	[gps_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[iata_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[local_code] nvarchar(4000),
	[coordinates] nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'PartitionData/type=large_airport/*.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [airportdemofilesystem_airportdemoadls_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.LargeAirports
GO
